label: 帳台試
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
見出し読み: ちょうだいのこころみ
説明文: [Held on the] Last Day of the Ox..., [T]his event, witnessed by the Emperor in the Jōneiden, was one of the preliminaries to the formal appearance of the Gosechi dancers at the final daijōsai banquet (p. 376). [常寧殿、五節、大嘗祭] [HW]
